Text: Do you want to reach a global audienceMr Mark E Haedicke I am currently in the process of sourcing papers for the Digital Media Web Portal and as a speaker at one of our previous conferences I would like to extend the invitation to you to provide a paper If you are not yet familiar with the Digital Media Web Portal it is a unique onestop information service for all media industry professionals and prides itself on providing excellent feature articles for our audience As an independent industryfocussed website we are establishing ourselves at the forefront of media providers We currently have a subscriber database of over industry professionals Please log onto the Portal to view past features and interviews The topic can be of your choice as long as it pertains to the digital media sector and is nonadvertorial in nature We are looking for a paper word length and would urge you to take up this opportunity to use the Portal as your platform If you would like any further information on the Portal or have any queries please do not hesitate to contact me on the details below Look forward to discussing this further Kind regards Zoe Ayliffe Managing Editor Digital Media World Australia Pty Ltd Tel Fax email mailto
